name: Big Cooking
description:
It’s time to heat things up in the App Store’s First Real Cash Cooking Competition! Join our famous heroine, Chelsea, and create delightful dishes from around the world within a couple of bite-sized minutes.

Put your culinary skills to the test as you compete head to head with other players to whip up the best drinks, entrees and desserts then quickly serve them up to happy customers!

You’ve got the SPEED, the ACCURACY, the STRATEGY. Unleash your Master Chef skills and WIN Real Dough$!$!

KEY FEATURES:
• Compete and win by managing your cooking steps wisely!
• Juggle orders to keep your customers happy and earn big tips!
• Travel to kitchens around the world from New York City and Italy to Mexico and more!
• Create tasty local dishes including pizza, burgers, onion rings, fajitas and more!
• Unlock advanced recipes and extra kitchen stations!
• Quick, light and fun gameplay that’s beautifully designed with amazing music!

If you have any questions about the game, feel free to contact us at contact@bigrunstudios.com

If you have any questions about the Skillz platform please contact: support@skillz.com
